title: Fear of Success
subtitle: Why We Run From the Very Thing We Were Born to Do
description: A raw manifesto for the quiet geniuses, the near-greats, and the ones who almost leapt. This book explores how trauma, guilt, and inherited limitation hold us backâ€”not from failure, but from greatness. It's not about fixing your fears. It's about redefining your relationship with power, visibility, and destiny.
targetAudience: Quiet geniuses, near-greats, and those who have held themselves back from their true potential
